summary: This document is an email chain between FBI agents discussing Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing on July 14, 2020, where she was denied bail and taken into custody. The agents discuss the possibility of a proffer agreement and note that Jeffrey Epstein's estate (EM) wants a Sensitive Case Notification (SCN) after the hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; her bail hearing occurred on July 14, 2020, and she was denied bail and taken into custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to indirectly via his estate (EM), which is requesting a Sensitive Case Notification following Maxwell's hearing.

connections.description: Maxwell is associated with Epstein's criminal activities, and his estate is involved in monitoring her legal proceedings.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Bail Hearing
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing took place, and she was denied bail and taken into custody.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was denied bail and taken into custody on July 14, 2020.
Jeffrey Epstein's estate (EM) requested a Sensitive Case Notification (SCN) following Maxwell's hearing.
There was discussion among FBI agents about the possibility of Maxwell offering a proffer agreement.
The email chain indicates coordination between FBI New York and the FBI Headquarters' Crimes Against Children and Human Trafficking Unit.
